https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5AnYk6YoVZVCMObD4LunWqIis8y.jpg A Russian Literature professor at the University of Havana is ordered to work as a translator for child victims of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster when they are sent to Cuba for medical treatment. Based on a true story. A Translator
